siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, As of this episode you may be listening on Spotify! Following up on last episode’s discussion, Stan tells us about his Reformation service experience. Jesus Christ is the light of the World and Stan’s church made it through 1/3 of the service with only candlelight…

frontmatter.title: Episode 17 - Reformation, Voting, and Kanban Moving Boards
